Abstrak: The article discusses the chalk art mandala installation projects of students at the walkway to the main entrance of the William T. Rogers Middle School in Kings Park, New York. Topics covered include description of the beginnings of the project, the effectiveness of the project in providing a venue for evaluating or reacting to student work and empowerment of the students.
Sumber: Educational Leadership. Apr2016, Vol. 73 Issue 7, p74-77. 4p
